Title: Title
filament::resources.sliders.title: Title
who_we_are.intro1: At Al-Sahoo Factory, we specialize in manufacturing and maintaining metal furniture and storage systems since 2000.
who_we_are.intro2: We offer high-quality products that meet the needs of offices, factories, educational and medical institutions, with a commitment to durability, precision, and on-time delivery.
who_we_are.features.0.title: High Manufacturing Quality
who_we_are.features.0.desc: We use durable metal materials and advanced techniques to ensure the longest product lifespan.
who_we_are.features.1.title: Product Variety
who_we_are.features.1.desc: We offer a wide range of metal furniture and storage systems to meet diverse needs.
who_we_are.features.2.title: Practical & Custom Designs
who_we_are.features.2.desc: We design solutions tailored to each facility, with customization options upon request.
who_we_are.features.3.title: On-Time Delivery Commitment
who_we_are.features.3.desc: We execute projects accurately and deliver them within the agreed schedule.
leadership: Leadership in manufacturing metal furniture and storage systems
leadership.description1: At Sahoo Factory, we combine engineering expertise with industrial precision to deliver high-quality metal products, designed to meet the requirements of offices, government facilities, and warehouses.
leadership.description2: We focus on providing integrated solutions starting from practical design through precise manufacturing to on-time delivery, giving our customers unmatched confidence in the durability of every product we offer.
leadership.description3: Don't settle for ordinary furniture — choose the durability you deserve.
filament::resources.categories.name: Name
filament::resources.products.title: Title
featured_products_description: Carefully selected metal solutions to suit various needs. Explore some of our top designs:
quality_you_feel: Quality You Can Feel at the Core of Work
quality_description: Watch real videos and images documenting the manufacturing stages, the advanced working environment, and modern production lines at Al-Sahoo factory. Here you’ll find the details that reflect our commitment to quality and excellence
trusted_by_clients_description: We are proud to provide our services to government entities, major companies, and leading institutions in Kuwait and beyond.
filament::resources.clients.name: Name
site.testimonials.title: What did they say about us?
site.testimonials.description: We are proud of the trust of our clients and partners in the Kuwaiti market. Here are some of their words after dealing with us:
site.contact.title: Contact us easily
site.contact.description: Our team is ready to receive your inquiries and provide you with the support you need quickly and professionally.
site.contact.message_placeholder: How can we help you? Share your request or inquiry.
site.contact.location_3: Al-Rai Branch – Next to the Iranian Market
site.contact.success: Your message has been sent successfully.
categories.header.title: Choose the category that suits your needs
categories.header.description: We offer a variety of metal furniture and storage solutions, designed to serve offices, factories, schools, and medical facilities with the highest quality and safety standards.
categories.header.more_info: For more details and inquiries, you can contact us.
why_sahoo.heading: Why Al-Sahoo?
why_sahoo.title: Leaders in Metal Furniture and Storage Systems
why_sahoo.paragraph1: At Al-Sahoo Factory, we combine engineering expertise and industrial precision to deliver high-quality metal products designed to meet the needs of offices, government facilities, and warehouses.
why_sahoo.paragraph2: We focus on providing integrated solutions that start with practical design, proceed through precise manufacturing, and end with on-time delivery — giving our clients unmatched confidence in the durability of every product we offer.
why_sahoo.highlight: Don’t settle for ordinary furniture — choose the durability you deserve.
projects.heading: Our Projects Speak for Our Excellence
projects.paragraph1: From precise design to perfect execution, we provide the best metal solutions tailored to your industrial and commercial needs.
projects.paragraph2: Watch our expertise transform into tangible results in every project.
featured_projects.heading: Projects We’re Proud Of — From Concept to Execution
featured_projects.description: We present real examples of our projects in metal furniture and storage systems across Kuwait and beyond. Excellence in execution, commitment to delivery, and customer satisfaction are our top priorities.
about_industry.title: We Manufacture Quality… and Perfect the Details
about_industry.paragraph1: We turn raw materials into storage systems, industrial furniture, and engineered solutions that serve you for years.
about_industry.paragraph2: Every project starts with an idea — and ends with refined details from design to execution. From the first measurement to the last screw — our work is calculated, and our quality is non-negotiable.
about_industry.paragraph3: Don’t settle for ordinary furniture — choose the durability you deserve.
project_details.title: Integrated Metal Storage Warehouse - Shuaiba Industrial
project_details.description: High-quality industrial warehouse design to effectively organize and facilitate material storage.
project_details.problem_text: Material buildup inside the warehouse and difficulty in quick access, negatively affecting workflow and productivity.
project_details.solution_text: Installation of strong, high-load-bearing metal shelves with vertical space optimization and wide aisles for easy equipment movement.
project_details.materials_value: High-quality galvanized steel with rust-resistant coating
about_industry.title: We Manufacture Quality… and Perfect the Details
about_industry.paragraph1: We turn raw materials into storage systems, industrial furniture, and engineered solutions that serve you for years.
about_industry.paragraph2: Every project starts with an idea — and ends with refined details from design to execution. From the first measurement to the last screw — our work is calculated, and our quality is non-negotiable.
about_industry.paragraph3: Don’t settle for ordinary furniture — choose the durability you deserve.

home.hero.subtitle: From the heart of Shuwaikh, we deliver expertly designed metal solutions for industrial and commercial sectors across Kuwait.

home.about.paragraph1: For over two decades, Al-Sahoo Factory has crafted high-quality metal furniture serving multiple sectors in and outside Kuwait...
home.about.paragraph2: We believe manufacturing is a responsibility, so we ensure quality at every step...

home.why.paragraph1: At Al-Sahoo Factory, we combine engineering expertise and industrial precision to deliver premium metal products...
